title: Apropos Ambigram
content:
My sister sent me a forward today with the following ambigram attached. Nice sentiment.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060357im_/http:/typophile.com/files/teachlearnambi_3588.png)
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
A reflection of every teachers hope for every student.

ChrisL

I think thats one amazing ambigram, but one lousy execution / realisation / 3dgradientwordartlookalikedesign. :)

Dav
:^) That is why I only commented on the sentiment. :^\>

Hello, Tifanny... I've ound this blog today and I'm vey happy.. :') ... But I have a question... Where Are you? 'Cause I can't find no more comments from you, and I want to make contact with someone in this blog, like you, to talk about the jewish culture and typography....

I hope you appear.... my msn:
